page.title: 09RURAL LIFE MUSEUM 1985
page.content: The museum is open from April 7th to Sept.29th. Admission 60p-adults,30p- students and UB40's,5p-children. Special exhibitions for 1985 are 'Circuses, Fairgrounds and Bands' and 'Women and children on the farm'. There is a regular programme of other activities, usually held on Sundays:- 7th April-Comezi Twins (circus actors) 28th April-Tie Break Theatre Company presents 'Follow the Plough' 12th May- Combustion Engine Rally 19th May- Concert by Watton Band 2nd June-Demonstration of spinning, weaving and dyeing. 17th-27th July-'Always November' - musical play by Masque theatre company 25th Aug.-Norfolk Harvest Tea. 8th Sept.-Friends Annual Open Day 22nd Sept.-Norfolk Postcard Collectors Club.
